title: Project B - React UI Component Library
description: A comprehensive collection of accessible, customizable React components built with TypeScript and modern design principles. Perfect for building scalable web applications.

sections.heading: Overview
sections.body:
Project B is a modern React component library designed to accelerate development of beautiful, accessible web applications. With over 50 components and a flexible theming system, it provides everything you need to build consistent user interfaces.

Built with accessibility in mind, every component follows WCAG 2.1 AA guidelines and includes proper ARIA attributes, keyboard navigation, and screen reader support.

sections.heading: Key Features
sections.body:
• 50+ production-ready React components
• Full TypeScript support with comprehensive type definitions
• Accessibility-first design (WCAG 2.1 AA compliant)
• Customizable theming system with CSS-in-JS
• Dark mode support out of the box
• Tree-shaking for optimal bundle sizes
• Comprehensive Storybook documentation
• Jest and React Testing Library test suite
• SSR (Server-Side Rendering) compatible
• Mobile-responsive design patterns

sections.heading: Component Categories
sections.body:
**Layout Components:**
• Grid, Flex, Container, Stack, Divider

**Form Components:**
• Input, Select, Checkbox, Radio, Switch, Textarea, DatePicker

**Navigation:**
• Navbar, Sidebar, Breadcrumb, Pagination, Tabs

**Feedback:**
• Alert, Toast, Modal, Tooltip, Progress, Spinner

**Data Display:**
• Table, Card, Badge, Avatar, List, Accordion

**Overlays:**
• Dropdown, Popover, Dialog, Drawer

sections.heading: Quick Start
Browser Support
sections.body:
Project B supports all modern browsers and follows React's compatibility guidelines:

• Chrome 76+
• Firefox 68+
• Safari 12+
• Edge 79+
• React 16.8+ (hooks required)
• TypeScript 4.1+
• Node.js 14+

For Internet Explorer support, additional polyfills may be required.
